text: In servlet, response.flushbuffer() would just flush all the data which we have writen to the response.getOutputstream before to the client side. However, tomcat6.0.14 would just keep it under either close of connection from the server side or 8k buffer limit reached. That bug would limit the capability for us to do the streaming.
